TLVBuffer - class com.ibm.opencard.buffer.TLVBuffer.
TLVBuffer objects are used to store a sequence of ASN.1 BER encoded TLVs.
A VariableTLVBuffer object has a certain capacity which is determined by the size of the byte array provided to the constructor.
TLVBuffer(byte[], int) - Constructor for class com.ibm.opencard.buffer.TLVBuffer
